title: ‘I want to imprison US citizens in El Salvador,’ says Donald Trump. What is his plan? Is that even legal?
description: US President Donald Trump on Monday reaffirmed his intent to send American citizens who commit violent crimes to prisons in El Salvador. During a conversation with El Salvador’s President Nayib Bukele, Trump remarked that Bukele might “have to build five more places” to accommodate the influx, as re...
